basics.name: Adrien Kohlbecker
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: I'm a Senior Software Engineer with a demonstrated experience in the computer software industry. Throughout my career, I have been focusing on building and operating reliable and scalable distributed systems, as well as increasing developer efficiency through automation.

work.summary: Datadog is a monitoring and analytics platform for cloud-scale application infrastructure. Within the Developer Efficiency team, my role is to help people be successful at their jobs through automation, processes and coaching. Specifically, I’m the main architect and operator behind our CI/CD infrastructure.
highlights: Designed from scratch and operated day to day our build infrastructure as a service. This includes configuration management and deployment, security hardening and multi-tenancy, secrets, monitoring, availability, SLOs, on-call rotations and post mortems, documentation. Oversaw a fleet of 200 build runners processing a million builds per month, relied upon by 400 engineers across multiple time zones
Wrote micro services and tools in Go and Python, configuration management in Ruby (chef-solo) and Terraform
Advanced user of AWS services, including IAM hardening, auto-scaling, VPC topology and security, and more
Deep knowledge of Docker and container operations at production scale
Mentored engineers on CI/CD best practices, helping reduce make-work and inefficiencies
Contributor to our local development environment, production artifacts stores and deployment tooling

work.summary: Sharette is a carpooling app mixing public transports with car rides in multimodal itineraries. As a technical founder, I built most of the product and managed an engineering team of 4 people.
highlights: Wrote micro services in Go and Ruby, and a cross-platform mobile app in Typescript and Angular
Researched and designed the routing algorithms powering our multimodal itinerary search
Led the integration of our API in the mobile apps of the Paris public transport company (RATP)
Responsible for a fully automated and monitored container based deployment on AWS
Open sourced the vagrant-fsnotify gem, a vagrant plugin providing filesystem notifications on shared folders

work.summary: Fidmarques is a mobile app that extracts and analyses the groceries you bought using a picture of your receipt. I was tasked with building a resilient data processing pipeline and improve developer efficiency with automation.
highlights: Refactored our data processing pipeline using the Ruote workflow manager for better efficiency and reliability
Built command-line tools for deployment and operations automation
Designed and implemented a duplicated receipt detection algorithm to help fraud detection
Open sourced two gems for controlling Resque jobs from Ruote: ruote-resque and ruote-synchronize

work.summary: Gullibear is a social network to share and contribute to social economy projects. As a technical founder I built most of the product, using Python and Backbone.js.

courses: MSc Engineering focusing on computer science and entrepreneurship.
Highly selective engineering school "Grande École" – top 1% on national level.
Exchange semester, focusing on computer science and entrepreneurship.
